issue.title: [CF 133] CrowdControl amendment
issue.body:
The preset added earlier for crowd control debuffs was missing:
3355 - trap launched type freezing trap (turns out its a different spellid for normal trap and otherwise)

CrowdControl = "339;2637;33786;118;61305;28272;61721;61780;28271;1499;60192;19503;19386;20066;10326;9484;6770;2094;51514;76780;710;5782;6358;3355",

(p.s. setting a mouseover debuff to watch those makes my life so much easier!)


> Posted by CurseForge user calico0 | Imported from CurseForge issue #133 | Raw
